Author: pokipokitoki
Text: Thank you, this helped ‚ù§ It's hard for me to remember that I don't deserve to be punished for receiving kindness sometimes.

Author: MotherLeader
Text: Whatever your friends do or do not know, the important thing is that they are cheering you on.   Your inner voice is hard on yourself already...let your friends applaud your strength because it's true! If you cannot be kind to yourself, let your friends be kind. It will help over time.  (isn't that the root of our EDs? The inability to be kind to ourselves? We all suffer from it and feel like imposters when other people love and care for us)
